Summary: my first ufo sighting was last night
divs: Sighting Detailsi was at my local hobby shop in wilmington nc,we race rc cars every wensday night,we took a 5 minute break i went outside to smoke,it was dark some clouds in the sky,i looked up at a angel and saw something moving i thought it was clouds uncovering stars,but no i looked to my right and up and saw a object moving,i did not know what it was.the object i saw was aprox,150 yards from corner to corner,i saw three lights one on each end point,lights were all one color,like a star there was no sound that i could here,it was moving around 15 to 25 mph it was as if it was full of helium so quiet,my feelings were did i just see a ufo i told myself no but i knew what i saw was no plane or flying machine i have ever seen,i wanted to tell someone when i saw it but thought they would just laugh and say sure you did.after the sighting i thought about it the rest of the night,trying to convence myself i didn't see a ufo,i still don't know what i saw but what ever it was it amazed me.i lost sight of it after it went into cloud cover.people will think i lost my mind if i tell this to anyone.
trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There were no other sightings in Wilmington on or around October 7th 2009
